ELEKTRA FUN RUN 2025
====================

by [fydamohd](https://fke.utm.my/author/fydamohd/ "Posts by fydamohd")
 | Feb 27, 2025 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/WhatsApp-Image-2025-02-25-at-4.02.24-PM-794x675.jpeg)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/WhatsApp-Image-2025-02-25-at-4.02.24-PM.jpeg)

⚡️ **Ready to Ignite Your Energy-Join ELEKTRA FUN RUN 2025!**⚡️

Feel the Power, Charge Your Limits!

Elektra Fun Run is not your ordinary race – it’s an electrifying experience designed for students and university staff who are ready to spark their competitive spirit and light up the track!

‍♂️ Date : **26th April 2025 (Saturday)**  
Venue : **Foyer P19a, FKE**  
Time : **7.30 AM – 10.30 AM**  
Flag-off : **8.00 AM**  
Fee :  
– **UTM staff and students (RM 55)**  
– **Non-UTM (RM 65)**  
– **Group Registration for 5 or more participants will get discount RM5 each person: UTM (RM50) & NON-UTM (RM60)**

✨ Why Join the Elektra Run?  
⚙️ Engineering-Inspired Fun – Experience a run themed around the wonders of electrical engineering!  
T- Shirt, Medal & E-Certificates – Every finisher earns a unique medal and a digital certificate to power up your achievements.  
Community & Connection – Network, have fun, and celebrate innovation with fellow students and staff.  
⚡️ Ready to run and recharge? Sign up now and be part of Elektra’s high-voltage experience!  
LUCKY DRAW WAITING FOR YOU‼️

REGISTER BEFORE 25th MARCH 2025

To register, click here⬇️  
https://forms.gle/b3W69WvJyPYqSkMx7

Any inquiries ➡️  
– Dr Riduan : +60 17-982 0048  
– ⁠Hayati : +6011-3296 3184

#ElektraRun2025 #PowerYourStride #RunWithEnergy
